models.name: OpenAI Embedding 3 Small
models.description: Latest small embedding model from OpenAI. Cost-effective and performs well for most use cases.

models.name: OpenAI Embedding 3 Large
models.description: Highest quality OpenAI embedding model with larger dimensions. Best for applications requiring maximum accuracy.

models.name: OpenAI Ada 002 (Legacy)
models.description: Legacy OpenAI embedding model. Consider upgrading to text-embedding-3-small for better cost and performance.

models.name: Cohere Embed English v3
models.description: Cohere's latest English embedding model. Good alternative to OpenAI with competitive pricing.

models.name: Cohere Embed Multilingual v3
models.description: Supports 100+ languages. Best choice for non-English or multilingual content.

models.name: Voyage AI v2
models.description: High-quality embeddings from Voyage AI. Requires separate API key.

models.name: Together AI M2-BERT
models.description: Cost-effective embedding model from Together AI with long context support.

notes.consistency: Changing embedding models requires re-embedding all existing chunks. Embeddings from different models are not comparable.
notes.dimensions: Higher dimensions generally provide better accuracy but require more storage and computation.
notes.pricing: Costs are approximate and subject to change. Check provider websites for current pricing.
notes.availability: High = widely available, Medium = some restrictions, Low = limited access or beta
